body.directions: Listen to the audio, and then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: Which of the following will you least likely find at the site indicated by the word in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 城市 chéngshì
options: Audio for 面包店 miànbāodiàn
Audio for 店铺 diànpù
Audio for 学校 xuéxiào
body.correct: Very nicely done! 社区 shèqū means “community.” Of the four choices, 城市 chéngshì (city), as a larger social unit, is unlikely found in a community.
body.incorrect: Very close. Listen to the word to identify its meaning. Then review the choices to see which one is a larger social unit and is unlikely to be found at the site indicated by the word.

body.textVersion: Audio for 购物中心 gòuwùzhōngxīn

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can be completed with the word in the audio?
body.answer: 我和姐姐去_____。 Wǒ hé jiějie qù _____.
options: 我们晚上看_____。 Wǒmen wǎnshàng kàn _____.
她每星期天擦_____。 Tā měi xīngqītiān cā _____.
他哥哥上午做_____。 Tā gēge shàngwǔ zuò _____.
body.correct: Fantastic job! 购物中心 gòuwùzhōngxīn means “shopping center,” and the verb that can go with it is 去 qù (to go to) in the sentence “我和姐姐去购物中心。 Wǒ hé jiějie qù gòuwùzhōngxīn. (My sister and I go to the shopping center.) “
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the audio again to identify this word’s meaning. Then review all the incomplete sentences in the choices to see which one this word fits the best for both meaning and structure. Pay attention to the verb used in each sentence.

body.quiz: Which of the following can you most reasonably get at the site indicated by the word in the audio?
body.correct: Very nice job! The word 面包店 miànbāodiàn means “bakery.” You can get cinnamon rolls there, but maybe not noodle soup.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the word in the audio again to identify its meaning. Imagine yourself at the site indicated by the word, and consider what you can possibly find.

body.quiz: Which of the following items can least likely be found at the site indicated by the word in the audio?
body.correct: Wonderfully done! The word 超市 chāoshì means “grocery store.” You can easily find all the items in the choices except a 浴缸 yùgāng (bathtub).
body.incorrect: Oops…Listen to the word in the audio again to identify its meaning. Then review the words in the choices. Recall their meanings, and then consider if you can find them at the site indicated by the word.
